__e: Hey, Bob, I get why she's so angry with me.

Okay, I know you must be furious with me, And I know you love him and all that, But it's true, Julia, and you really had to know.
You think because I'm a woman, I'm going to be upset. I'm fine, Mark.
My folks used to get really mad because I'd just talk about it and talk about it and talk about it all the time,
You know, I think that you're just pissed off - 'cause Jesus didn't beam you up!
She's furious with your father. Your father's already fuming at her. You're caught right in the middle.
I am angry. I am mad at that lady for what she did to her kid.

(Sighs) I am so mad at you right now, I don't even know what to say.
